# Changelog

## 1.1.5 (2025-10-02)
* Update dependencies ([MGNLCLI-436](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-436))

## 1.1.4 (2025-09-19)
* Hotfix: Remove part causing 404 when downloading from nexus

## 1.1.3 (2025-09-16)
* Jumpstart should resolve template path before switching CWD ([MGNLCLI-421](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-421))

## 1.1.2 (2025-08-08)
* Ask for credentials before checking for tomcat ([MGNLCLI-417](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-417))

## 1.1.1 (2025-08-07)
* Set allowVariants property for the magnoliaAuthor ([MGNLCLI-407](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-407))
* Add optional [name] argument to jumpstart command ([MGNLCLI-408](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-408))
* Download correct tomcat version ([MGNLCLI-413](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-413))

## 1.1.0 (2025-06-06)
* Add support for named auth profiles in project templates for reusing credentials across bundles ([MGNLCLI-387](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-387))
* Add support for 6.4 version ([MGNLCLI-389](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-389))
* Use project-templates from gitlab instead of bitbucket ([MGNLCLI-390](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-390))

## 1.0.6 (2025-05-30)
* Ignore -overlay webapps from nexus ([MGNLCLI-391](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-391))

## 1.0.5 (2025-04-30)
* Set graphql.introspection property to true ([MGNLCLI-371](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-371))
* Inform user about using name and password tokens from nexus ([MGNLCLI-374](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-374))

## 1.0.4 (2025-03-17)
* Fix template download ([MGNLCLI-366](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-366))

## 1.0.3 (2025-03-17)
* Add lightModulesPath to mgnl.config.js ([MGNLCLI-255](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-255))
* Place bundle to correct place when no postCommand is defined ([MGNLCLI-276](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-276))
* Add depcheck to husky ([MGNLCLI-289](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-289))
* Enhance tests with various templates configuration and flags ([MGNLCLI-304](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-304))
* Explore supporting both ESM and CommonJS in our packages ([MGNLCLI-313](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-313))
* Failed to download war with MGNL CLI 5 ([MGNLCLI-327](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-327))
* Mgnl CLI doesn't work in CN ([MGNLCLI-322](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-322))
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))
* Add note that project will be created in current working directory ([MGNLCLI-335](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-335))
* Highlight when light modules are found during jumpstart ([MGNLCLI-337](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-337))

## 1.0.2 (2024-10-15)
* use alternative groupId and artifactId for latest magnolia version ([MGNLCLI-303](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-303))

## 1.0.1 (2024-10-15)
* use @5 version of @magnolia/cli ([MGNLCLI-302](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-302))

## 1.0.0 (2024-10-14)
* introduce `@magnolia/cli-jumpstart-plugin` package
